body: Hey, its the colorist here, I was doing this and SN2 but health started failing and got stuck in the hospital for about a week. Now im just doing one at a time, and im almost done with SN2. I PROMISE that this will be finished, but right now, still nit at 10o percent.
Complains about the poster complaining about the work posted. Then complains about the work posted. Dumb fucking kiddo

>>Can you finish coloring before uploading? It's not that no one appreciates it, but there are so many incomplete uploads.

Can you suck cock a little hard with more slurping?
We don't need ANY half-finished shitstain posts here.  ONE is too many, and the place is flooded with turds.

Either finish the job or don't.  Don't fucking post your half-assed, half-done work hoping sniveling cunts like this will be thrilled.  If we stopped giving out handjobs to every shitposter, there'd be a lot less 'INCOMPLETE' posts.
Can you finish coloring before uploading? It's not that no one appreciates it, but there are so many incomplete uploads.
It's completely translated, what's ongoing is the coloring. Which I've never been a fan of.
